title: Woman wounded had shot herself, then drove to hospital, JPSO says
content:
(Image via Thinkstock)
A woman who was injured in a shooting in Jefferson Parish on New Year's Eve night had a self-inflicted wound and drove herself to the hospital for treatment, authorities said.
The woman drove herself to West Jefferson Medical Center, 1101 Medical Center Blvd. in Marrero, for treatment of what is believed to be a non-life-threatening gunshot wound, the Jefferson Parish Sheriff's Office said.
Authorities sent an alert about the shooting shorty before 11:40 p.m. Saturday, listing the address of the hospital. They indicated later the woman had driven there and the shooting took place elsewhere.
It was not immediately known how the woman accidentally shot herself, or where on her body she was shot.
Homicides went up 59 percent in 2016, with 43 killings, though that total nearly mirrors decade-long average
